list.name: Default
list.comment: Added setup.py and hence a built binary of the game

list.name: artwork
list.comment: Added cat evade artwork to images

list.name: docs
list.comment: Added more TODO tasks in README

task.summary: Default task
Fixed the dialogue speech bubble misaligned bug for boss
Added the 3rd and final coop level
Merged events.py into gameobject.py for better encapsulation
Added sound effects to the splash screen
Updated audio.py to allow repeating and autoplaying of sounds
Added sound effects to options menu
Updated Dialogue class to use @property to simplify code
Changed sound effects for main menu
Added some basic sound effects to SoloScene01
Added audio for main character
Updated audio component to use python @property
Added heartbeat sound effect to solo ui menu
Improved heartbeat sound effects for solo ui menu
Added sound effects to lose menu
Refactored SoloScene02 to work with updated RenderComponent
Refactored SoloScene03 to work with updated RenderComponent
Refactored CoopScene02 to work with updated RenderComponent
Refactored CoopScene03 to work with updated RenderComponent
Refactored all coop scenes to work with updated RenderComponent
Split scenes into solo and coop modules as too large in single
Added audio for pig boss
Added a menu between the splash and main menu for style
Updated README and LICENSE
Updated README
Updated the quality of the README gifs
Fixed alignment issues in README
Added SoloScene04 to single player
Tweaked spawn point of SoloScene04
Translated dialogues into Spanish
Updated background of SoloScene04
Added more torches to SoloScene04
Added missing dialogue to JailScene04 of single player
Updated Coop JailScene01 with minor details; new artwork
Added new backgrounds for coop scenes
Improved the quality of the artwork for the office cutscene
Added missing __init__.py files to all packages
Added pig boss cutscene artwork to images
Added cat evade artwork to images
Added more TODO tasks in README
Added a class for the pig cutscene
Refactored the event handlers of the scene engine for clarity
Refactored scene engine code (simplifying redundant logic)
Added artwork for the spear and swinging traps
Updated pause handling of Scene Engine (and fixed a hidden bug)
Integrated pig cutscene into JailScene04 (solo) and JailScene03 (coop)
Added an incomplete ForestScene01 (wrapping up project)
Adjusted timing of dialogues in Office cutscene to be slower
Updated README
Added redundant evade animation for storage purposes
